name: UX Gesture Kit
description:
A nice primer for gesture SVG’s/sticker sheets/whatever you want in Figma or FigJam...do with them as you please. Easy to modify with a different fill or swap the gesture hand/pointer. I recommend using these in any static interaction/UX docs to help convey that items are interactive and how to interact with them. Super useful for documenting component patterns for developer hand-off, or for general reference.


Just a little freebie for the community, courtesy of a friendly neighborhood product designer.

— @ponchofreedo


* Will try to publish updates and optimize as often as I can!

** This is a port from a Sketch project so I hope there are no quirks. If there are, please don't hesitate to reach out!
